description: Timely is an automatic time-tracking platform capturing activity across applications, calendars, and devices, creating detailed timesheets for billing or productivity insights

tools.name: TIMELY_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to create a new webhook for the specified account. Use after specifying the target URL and event subscriptions. Call only once per configuration.

inputSchema.title: CreateWebhookRequest

url.title: Url
url.description: The HTTPS endpoint that will receive webhook payloads.

secret.title: Secret Token
secret.description: Optional secret token used to sign and verify webhook payloads.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: List of event types to subscribe to for receiving notifications.

inputSchema.description: Parameters required to create a Timely webhook.

tools.name: TIMELY_RETRIEVE_ACCOUNT
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific account by its ID. Use when you need to fetch fresh account info after confirming the ID. Example: "Retrieve account details for account ID 364"

inputSchema.title: RetrieveAccountRequest

id.title: Id
id.description: Identifier of the account to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request model for retrieving a Timely account by ID.
